Tonii is now available on the web!

January 4, 2024


Tonii is now playable in your browser! We still do recommend the download version, but if you don't want to, this is an easier option. The 1.1.2 update has also been released for download and browser, with a few minor bug fixes .

This will probably be the last Tonii update for a while, as we are about to begin on a new project .

If you want to support us, you can follow our itch page, subscribe to our Youtube, or tell others about our games.



Version 1.1.2 Changelog:
  • Added web support
  • Fixed the sound of a fox activating a button playing during the final cutscene


Play Tonii
